about_the_game:
DeathCrank is a fast-paced, local and online multiplayer 3D vehicle combat game that combines the best of games like Twisted Metal and Burnout, with a top-down retro feel. Battle it out in 5 game modes ranging from traditional free-for-all DeathMatcch and Capture the Flag, to "Collect the Gears. Physics-based weaponry, environmental hazards, and large amount of viable strategies make this a great battle game for casual parties or hardcore gamers alike. It's total mayhem and a ton of fun. Duke it out in matches of 2 to 8 players, and even mix local and online combatants in our network multiplayer modes.

With more game modes planned and an arsenal of weapons from good 'ol rockets and bombs to crazy game-changing super weapons like the dreaded Black Hole gun, and the diabolically powerful Freeze gun, there's sure to be some high action in every match.

With all the best parts of vehicle combat games of the past with some great new twists, DeathCrank is sure to please.
detailed_description:
Developer Access

We are committed to bringing the best experience to our players. That's why we develop LIVE on Twitch.tv (Find the link in Basic Info!), and invite you to come join us for our daily stream. YOUR feedback, suggestions, features, and input is valuable to us. Meet other Arconyx fans and DeathCrank players and help us improve the game. Want to talk shop about game development? Come on by!


Early Beta Access

Get the game before release, and contribute to the game content! During our Early Access phase, we will be paying attention to the weapons, power-ups, game modes, and features that our players are asking for, and finishing up the game by FOCUSING on those areas. Have an idea for a great game mode? Let us know! Hate the Black Hole gun? Have an idea for a better replacement? We want to hear from you! When we come out of Early Access in Q1 2017, you will know YOU had a hand in helping bring an awesome game even further.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
